article_title: Pro-Gun Ad Banned From Super Bowl Going Viral
article_text:

og.description: A gunmaker's commercial that the National Football League's rules prohibit from being broadcast during the Super Bowl is still going viral, and the ad's creator says the company created the spot not only to promote the business, but to champion Second Amendment...
